title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1550.6 - Time and location of inspection of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1550.6 - Time and location of inspection of records

State Regulations

Requests for public access to records of the fund shall be
accepted and such records shall be made available for public inspection at the
fund's office on any workday during the hours of 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. No records
may be removed by the applicant from the fund's office without the permission
of the records access officer. Notes

1550.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
